title: WATCH LIVE: World premiere of the new Volkswagen Golf 8
text:
Volkswagen will present the eighth generation at a world premiere in Wolfsburg on Thursday, October 24. The automaker says the latest model will feature more digitalisation and connectivity than ever before, packed with innovations and, sporting a highly expressive design.



Volkswagen South Africa will shed more light on details of when the new model will be released locally during the course of the evening.



Wheels24's Sean Parker is attending the event in Johannesburg where the live streaming will be watched with the local automaker, look out for full details on Friday.

READ: Coming soon! Meet the new Mk8 - Volkswagen builds its fastest Golf yet

Follow the live stream below which starts at 6PM:
description: Volkswagen will reveal its eighth generation Golf to the world at an event in Wolfsburg, Germany, with the new car set to reach South Africa later in 2020.
